page.title: 09HOUSING: BUTLER, TITHBY
page.content: Housing is attractively varied and development has mainly been limited to rebuilding and infilling. At{Cropwell{ {Butler}old cottages have been improved & modernised, & stand cheek-by-jowl with large and small modern houses and bungalows, & 19 Century houses. There are 5 Listed Houses, 6 of Special Interest and two large farmhouses. A local Authority estate of flats, houses & bungalows is becoming owner- occupied. There are two large farmhouses at {Tithby}and a few owner-occupied properties. At{Tithby & Wiverton}the farm cottages have all been modernised. Rushcliffe Council are taking the Hall in hand to force a sale for it to be converted into a viable project.
